title: Proposal 🧾
description: Ganesh, the matchmaker 😁, has shared details about Reena for the marriage proposal.

title: Love at first sight 💗
description: Our tale began on the auspicious day of Ram Navami, when we first met at Shri Siddhanathan Temple, with our families in tow.

title: Connect 🥺
description: I reached out via WhatsApp, but the conversation was graciously deferred until our families formally blessed and sealed our marital destiny.

title: Dad's visit 🤝
description: Dad, Mama, Ganesh Bhaiya visited our home before confirming the marriage.

title: Connect 2.0 🥰
description: The next time I messaged her, she was eager to talk, her words brimming with love and excitement.

title: Met her 😍
description: It was the first time we met in Milkipur, as she was returning from Faizabad, with just the two of us.

title: Love's first visit 💖🏠
description: My love stepped into my home for the first time, and my heart knew it was forever.

title: First good bye ❤️‍🩹
description: The last time we met before going to Chennai, it didn’t go very well.

title: An internship 💖🏠
description: At home to join primary internship, First Rasoi

title: The Signature 🫶
description: Met at home when I came from chennai and she came to sign in primary
